reviews.productTitle: DEWENWILS Wireless Light Switch and Receiver Kit, No in-Wall Wiring Required,Remote Control Wall Switch Lighting Fixture for Ceiling Lights, Fans, Lamps,100 Ft RF Range, Programmable
reviews.text: Es una lástima que no pueda terminar mi trabajo por un switch que ya he comprado dos veces y me hace lo mismo., enciende y luego no apaga. El primero nunca apagó la lámpara led de pared, y el segundo la apaga a veces; mayormente no la apaga. He perdido mucho tiempo en montar y desmontar la lámpara más el viaje de devolución. La atención al cliente fue buena a pesar de que me “alertaron” de que si no la devolvía me la cobrarían a mi tarjeta de Amazon. Espero que esta vez entonces me digan que me la regalan por tantas molestias, porque la calidad del producto no parece buena, a pesar de los cientos de buenos review. Debería aclararse en la descripción si necesita un consumo MÍNIMO para que funcione correctamente. Ya me ocurrió con la fuente de alimentación de una lámpara. 5/25/2025El reemplazo volvió fallar después de una semana. Buena atención al cliente, pero el producto muy malo.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2025
reviews.title: Decepción doble.

reviews.productTitle: DEWENWILS Wireless Light Switch and Receiver Kit, No in-Wall Wiring Required,Remote Control Wall Switch Lighting Fixture for Ceiling Lights, Fans, Lamps,100 Ft RF Range, Programmable
reviews.text: Easy to install and works. However as others have said, you need a clear path between the light and the switch. Even trying to instal right next to a window frame 15 feet away did not work, and if you have other LED bulbs on nearby it can also cause interference. However, it does best having an electrician run a new switch for us. This was for a ceiling light that was replacing a ceiling fan with pull cords.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2025
reviews.title: It’s works, but barely.

This doesn't effect performance, just brings the aesthetic and user experience down considerably.

reviews.productTitle: DEWENWILS Wireless Light Switch and Receiver Kit, No in-Wall Wiring Required,Remote Control Wall Switch Lighting Fixture for Ceiling Lights, Fans, Lamps,100 Ft RF Range, Programmable
reviews.text: READ THIS TROUBLESHOOTING TIP: If after installing the wireless switch to control a light fixture it turns ON but not OFF or it requires many pushes off etc. AND you are using an LED light bulb, remove the LED bulb and try an incandescent bulb. If it is now reliable and you still want to use an LED purchase a "dimmable" bulb. I've had good luck with Phillips bulbs. These are semiconductor switches and there is a technical reason they don't work well with LED bulbs.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
reviews.title: Troubleshooting

reviews.productTitle: DEWENWILS Wireless Light Switch and Receiver Kit, No in-Wall Wiring Required,Remote Control Wall Switch Lighting Fixture for Ceiling Lights, Fans, Lamps,100 Ft RF Range, Programmable
reviews.text: I bought this to put in my bathroom. The current lightswitch is behind the door. When I went to install this switch I was baffled, as I discovered mine is a 3 way switch with unknown where the other switch is. I have two hot wires entering the switch. After some Google and YouTube research, I discovered I could bypass the light switch and install at the light fixture. I was going to return the item and claim defeat. But it works and I can now turn on the light without having to go around the door! Go me!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2024
reviews.title: Works great, after some teoubleshooting!

reviews.productTitle: DEWENWILS Wireless Light Switch and Receiver Kit, No in-Wall Wiring Required,Remote Control Wall Switch Lighting Fixture for Ceiling Lights, Fans, Lamps,100 Ft RF Range, Programmable
reviews.text: The remote need to be in horizontal direction towards the switch, slow speed to respond to the remote clicks, if the remote is vertical and mounted to the wall then it gets glitchy and won't function properly. Even the distance between the light fixture is less than 5ft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2024
reviews.title: It is not high quality!

reviews.productTitle: DEWENWILS Wireless Light Switch and Receiver Kit, No in-Wall Wiring Required,Remote Control Wall Switch Lighting Fixture for Ceiling Lights, Fans, Lamps,100 Ft RF Range, Programmable
reviews.text: Installation was an issue because the learn button can easily get bumped by wires etc. You do need to program remote BEFORE installation. Worse than installation was range. 'ON' seemed to work fine. 'OFF' needed to be within 1' not 100' of receiver.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2024
reviews.title: Range and design issues
